scheme_name: Scheme for Assistance to MSMEs for Market Development
description: The Scheme for Assistance to MSMEs for Market Development in Rajasthan supports Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises in enhancing their market presence through financial assistance for marketing, exhibitions, and export promotion activities.
key_features: Financial aid for marketing and promotional activities
Support for participation in trade fairs and exhibitions

benefits.financial_assistance: Up to Rs. 5 Lakhs for marketing and export promotion activities
benefits.reimbursement: Up to 50% of expenses for trade fairs, max Rs. 2 Lakhs

business_criteria: Must be a registered MSME as per the MSME Development Act, 2006
operational_criteria: Must engage in marketing or export promotion activities
Must have a valid Udyam Registration

eligible_activities: Participation in state, national, or international trade fairs
Developing marketing materials and export strategies

steps: Visit the Rajasthan Industries Department portal or scheme website
Submit an online application with details of proposed activities
Upload required documents, including MSME registration and expense estimates
Applications are reviewed by the District Industries Centre (DIC)
Approved applicants receive funding or reimbursement
application_process.note: Reimbursement claims require proof of participation and expenses

special_notes: Funding is limited to approved marketing activities
MSMEs must submit claims within the specified period
Priority is given to export-oriented MSMEs
